comment: Over minimal implicational calculus, Peirce's axiom ~ peirce implies an axiom sometimes called "Roll", ` ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) -> ( ( ch -> ph ) -> ph ) ) ` , of which ~ looinv is a special instance. The converse also holds: substitute ` ( ph -> ps ) ` for ` ch ` in Roll and use ~ id and ~ ax-mp . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jun-2021.)
